response.overview: The film tells the story of a widow whose husband died in a traffic accident, who finds herself for the first time facing the demands of life, after the absence of the family's sole breadwinner. To obtain the blood money for her deceased husband, she will resort to one of her neighbors to help her extract the amount due. However, the neighbor, whose name is “Lalla Mawlati,” takes advantage of the widow’s kindness and naivety to try to seize the blood money by plotting a series of conspiracies against her, and fabricating charges against one of her sons in agreement with a person with disabilities. Antecedents.
response.title: الدية
